text: Pogonocherus anatolicus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Daniel in 1898. It is known from Syria, Cyprus, and Turkey.BioLib.cz - Pogonocherus anatolicus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Pogonocherini Category:Beetles described in 1898
title: Pogonocherus anatolicus
